aleksandeR 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Package index

Formatting

Functions made for formatting output for Quarto or Rmarkdown. Also useful for copy-pasting outputs from the R console.

format_num()
Format a number for presentation

Themes

Theme functions for differnet types of plots

theme_map()
A theme made for maps from ggplot2::geom_map().
theme_map_color()
A color-ready theme made for maps from ggplot2::geom_map().

Wrappers

Wrappers around other useful functions
